item.title: In The Beginning
item.description: This is my first post on this blog. Needless to say, I'm really excited about this. This is my first attempt in writing blog posts in English. I was previously posting in Russian at LJ and Tumbler, but it wasn't about technical things. Here, I will try to post only about CS. I have huge plans on posting about Scala and it's application for research of purely functional data structures. I should probably post about algorithms and data structures that I've already implemented in Scalacaster. There are loads of awesome pieces of Scala code that I want to tell. One of my favorites - QuickSelect in a purely functional setting.
